name: cumulate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] to collect a large amount of something over a period of time by gradually adding more: The system has the ability to cumulate data over a number of years. They have cumulated debts of over $10 million.
[ I ] to gradually increase by combining with other things over a period of time: These small delays can cumulate and become a problem.
